title: Work Experience
intro: My professional experiences have allowed me to explore different facets of Python development. I've had the opportunity to participate in various projects, where I not only developed strong technical skills but also learned the importance of listening and collaboration. My user-oriented approach pushes me to always look for ways to improve the products I develop, ensuring they are both functional and enjoyable to use.

description: Created a website for publishing articles and collecting feedback as a volunteer project contributing to the initiative to share knowledge about Eurasian issues.
Full application development including backend with Django and PostgreSQL database, frontend technologies like HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and HTMX for a modern, responsive UI.
Key features include user registration, commenting on articles, personalized notifications, user profiles, contact form, and dynamic content display based on user interactions.
Deployment and maintenance ensuring high availability and optimal performance through continuous monitoring, regular updates, and optimizations.
Positive feedback on user experience and aesthetics, highlighting intuitive navigation, responsive design, and visual appeal, enhancing platform impact and reach.
Fixed a critical bug affecting transaction validity between users, restoring smooth and reliable app operation.
Partial rewrite of the project optimizing performance, reducing loading time by 25% and increasing responsiveness, improving user satisfaction.
Implemented peer-to-peer routing solution, eliminating server storage needs, optimizing data handling and improving transaction security.
Enhanced UI with NetworkX integration for visualizing peer-to-peer transactions, making the app more intuitive and easier to understand connections.
Wrote detailed documentation and collaborated closely with the team to add new features ensuring smooth transition and adoption by end users.
Designed intuitive and responsive UI ensuring smooth and pleasant navigation on all devices including desktops, tablets, and smartphones, focusing on ergonomics and responsive design.
Full app development combining robust Java EE backend, performant MySQL database, and interactive frontend using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, jQuery, and AJAX for smooth dynamic user experience.
Implemented advanced registration page with real-time data validation offering a smooth and secure experience, preventing errors and ensuring data integrity.
Created dynamic search functionality with instant sorting for quick and intuitive data access, improving navigation efficiency.
Organized code effectively to avoid repetition, facilitating maintainability and future evolution, reducing technical debt, and ensuring sustainable optimized development.
